record.name: Review

manualTransition.mtCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"$L.tableAccess.delete=true and jscall("sdUtil.isCanBeClosed", incident.id in $L.file)=true"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>

autoTransition.atCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Resolved</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Status">open</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">Callback</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
autoTransition.atCondDesc: ( open in CurrentRecord != "Resolved" AND open in CurrentRecord != "Callback")

action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"jscall("sdUtil.changeCatBlocked")=false and jscall("sdUtil.isSDLinked",incident.id in $L.file)=false"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>

action.actionCondition: nullsub($G.ess, false)=false and nullsub(lioption("Knowledge Management"), false)
action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"nullsub($G.ess, false)=false and nullsub(lioption("Knowledge Management"), false)"</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( Expression: nullsub($G.ess, false)=false and nullsub(lioption("Knowledge Management"), false))

action.actionCondition: $G.ess=false and (category in $L.file) isin $G.auth.categories and $L.mode~="add" and nullsub(jscall("security.getRights", "Service Desk", "new"), "false")="true"
action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="expression"><Expression caption="">"$G.ess=false and category in $L.file isin $G.auth.categories and $L.mode ~= "add" and nullsub(jscall("security.getRights", "Service Desk", "new"), "false") = "true""</Expression></operand></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( Expression: $G.ess=false and category in $L.file isin $G.auth.categories and $L.mode ~= "add" and nullsub(jscall("security.getRights", "Service Desk", "new"), "false") = "true")

action.actionCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Service Desk">Service Desk</Area><Right caption="View">view</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="boolean">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
action.actionCondDesc: ( the "View" value in the "Service Desk" Security Area = true)

altForm.altFormCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$view.ess.mode.two">$view.ess.mode.two</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Service Desk">Service Desk</Area><Right caption="ess.edit.format">ess.edit.format</Right></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
altForm.altFormCondDesc: ( $G.ess = "true" AND $view.ess.mode.two = "true" AND the "ess.edit.format" value in the "Service Desk" Security Area = NULL)

altForm.altFormDesc: Service Desk " Edit Form" configured in Service Desk Security Settings
altForm.altFormCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$view.ess.mode.two">$view.ess.mode.two</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="security"><Area caption="Service Desk">Service Desk</Area><Right caption="ess.edit.format">ess.edit.format</Right></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
altForm.altFormCondDesc: ( $G.ess = "true" AND $view.ess.mode.two = "true" AND the "ess.edit.format" value in the "Service Desk" Security Area != NULL)

altForm.altFormCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess.mode.one">$G.ess.mode.one</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess.mode.one">$G.ess.mode.one</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition></collection><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess.approval">$G.ess.approval</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$essview.approvals">$essview.approvals</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>

<XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess.mode.one">$G.ess.mode.one</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess.mode.one">$G.ess.mode.one</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition></collection><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.svccat.related">$G.svccat.related</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$view.catitems">$view.catitems</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>

<XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess">$G.ess</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><collection logical="AND" negate=""><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess.mode.one">$G.ess.mode.one</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">NULL</Value></condition><condition logical="OR" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$G.ess.mode.one">$G.ess.mode.one</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition></collection><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$view.ess.related">$view.ess.related</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>

altForm.altFormDesc: ESS Service Desk Update Browse Form

record.updateCondXML: <XmlCondition><collection logical="" negate="" ><condition logical="" negate="false"><operand type="variable"><VariableName caption="$L.tableAccess.update">$L.tableAccess.update</VariableName></operand><Comparison>equals</Comparison><Value dataType="string">true</Value></condition><condition logical="AND" negate="false"><operand type="field"><TableName>CurrentRecord</TableName><FieldName caption="Approval Status">approval.status</FieldName></operand><Comparison>neq</Comparison><Value dataType="string">denied</Value></condition></collection></XmlCondition>
